description: Non material amendment of application P2013/2721/FUL dated 5th February 2014 for 'partial demolition of existing facades, structures and walls including the removal of an existing A1 retail unit with alterations to existing facades and structures to provide new entrances, a pavilion, facades, pavement lights and structures, with associated public realm, landscaping and other works.' The proposed amendments are: 1. The insertion of backed louvres on the west elevation at mezzanine and first floor level, to replace three window panes (amendment shown on proposed elevation C-C, drawing A (1-) 401 Rev E4); 2. The insertion of two high-level windows on the east elevation at mezzanine level (amendment shown on proposed elevation D-D, drawing A (1-) 401 Rev E4); and 3. Amendment to the profile of the concrete roof pop-out to accommodate a new internal staircase, and upgrading of the louvered panels in this location.
